title: Almond dukka
ingredients: ['100g chopped blanched almonds', '2 tablespoons sesame seeds', '4 teaspoons red chilli powder', '2 teaspoons ground turmeric', '1 teaspoon onion salt', '1 teaspoon celery salt', '1 teaspoon cumin seeds', '1 teaspoon ground coriander', '1 pinch ground cayenne pepper, or to taste']
